Package net.finmath.montecarlo.process

Class LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithFactorDrift

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.finmath.montecarlo.process.AbstractLogNormalProcess
      • net.finmath.montecarlo.process.LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithFactorDrift
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessWithFactorDrift, MonteCarloProcess, Process
    public class LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithFactorDrift
extends AbstractLogNormalProcess
implements MonteCarloProcess, ProcessWithFactorDrift
    This class is an abstract base class to implement a multi-dimensional multi-factor log-normal Ito process. The dimension is called numberOfComponents here. The default for numberOfFactors is 1.
    Since:
    finmath-lib 4.1.0
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Christian Fries

      • clone

        public LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithFactorDrift clone()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloProcess
        Create and return a clone of this process. The clone is not tied to any model, but has the same process specification, that is, if the model is the same, it would generate the same paths.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface MonteCarloProcess
        Specified by:
        clone in interface Process
        Specified by:
        clone in class AbstractLogNormalProcess
        Returns:
        Clone of the process

      • getCloneWithModifiedData

        public MonteCarloProcess getCloneWithModifiedData​(Map<String,​Object> dataModified)
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloProcess
        Returns a clone of this model where the specified properties have been modified. Note that there is no guarantee that a model reacts on a specification of a properties in the parameter map dataModified. If data is provided which is ignored by the model no exception may be thrown.
        Specified by:
        getCloneWithModifiedData in interface MonteCarloProcess
        Parameters:
        dataModified - Key-value-map of parameters to modify.
        Returns:
        A clone of this model (or this model if no parameter was modified).
